title: Ticket #993: condor_submit without Globus gives misleading error message
description:
Build condor on a platform that normally has Globus support, but turn it off in configure. Given the resulting binaries, try to run condor_submit for a universe=cream job and a valid x509userproxy=/path/to/it.

Expected output: "This version of Condor was built without Globus support, and cannot process this job."

Actual output: "ERROR: can't determine proxy filename"

Discovered when some merges unexpectedly left me building sans Globus.
